options.name: Shadow Walker
options.description: You move through darkness like a living shadow. Gain +1 skill with stealth. When you kill a creature, the next stealth check you make before the start of your next turn gains a bonus dice.

options.name: Action : Phantom Throw
options.description: You make a throwing attack while hidden. If you have cover, you can roll a stealth check

options.name: Action : Silencing Strike
options.description: You make a precise attack designed to prevent your target from calling for help. You make a brawling attack that deals no damage, but strikes in a way that the target cannot speak or make noise until the end of their next turn if at least 3 of the dice hit.

options.name: Death from Shadows
options.description: You strike with lethal precision when enemies cannot see you coming. When you are hidden, you can add a stealth dice into your attack check dice pool.

options.name: Stalker
options.description: You can track and pursue targets relentlessly. Gain +1 skill with senses. You can automatically detect if someone you've seen before is within a short (10 unit) distance if they are currently visible.

options.name: Cold Blooded
options.description: You have seen some horrible things and do not break easily. Gain +1 skill with resilience and +2 maximum resolve.

options.name: Action : Assassinate
options.description: You attempt to instantly kill a target with a single, precise strike. You must be hidden and adjacent to the target. Make a weapon attack with a simple weapon. If the attack hits, the target dies instantly if they are minion tier. Grunts are executed on 2 successful dice hits and standard creatures on 3.

options.name: Poison Master
options.description: You have mastered the art of toxins and chemical warfare. Gain +1 skill with alchemy. When you poison a creature, the first time they take damage from it, they take it twice.

options.name: Remote Kill
options.description: You have mastered the art of killing with traps. Gain +1 skill with engineering. When your traps do damage to a grunt or minion, they are executed even if the damage did not bring them to 0 health.

options.name: Master Assassin
options.description: You have achieved legendary status as a dealer of death. Gain +1 skill with complex ranged weapons and +1 skill with throwing weapons.
